messages.title: Don't wake up to a Tory government on Friday
messages.content: Lisa Forbes is a local mum who gets what life is like for everyday people. A vote for Lisa is a vote for a strong voice for Peterborough in Parliament.

messages.title: 5 things to remember
messages.content: You don't need your polling card to vote. Polls are open 7am - 10pm. If you've got a postal vote, but haven't sent it back yet, you can take it to any polling station before 10pm. If you need a lift to vote, call our campaign hotline on 01733 708957. Place a (X) next to Labour. Please use all of your votes for Labour on Thursday 7 May.

leaflet.personalStatement: Lisa Forbes is a local mum who gets what life is like for everyday people.

images.caption: Vote Labour - Real People, Real Change

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is focused on the message of 'Real People, Real Change' and does not detail specific policy positions or make mention of other candidates or party leaders. It emphasizes the tactical importance of voting Labour to prevent a Tory government.
